title: Start
body:
Bob: "Thanks for taking my call!
I got a serious pest problem that needs taking care of."
[["I can handle a few pests." |yes]] 
[[ "I don't mess with Rats.." |no]]

title: yes
body:
Bob: "Great! I'll give you bonus pay for collecting any eggs left behind! 
See you inside the Old Barn."

title: no
body:
Bob: "Shame, I was going to offer [b]bonus pay[/b] for making them disappear.
Nevermind."
